entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then north 20 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
